coreAtributes.name: tabard dance skirt
coreAtributes.description: Panties fitted with flowing layers of cloth.

displacementText.playerSelf: You take off your tabard dance skirt.
displacementText.playerNPC: You pull off [npc.name]'s tabard dance skirt.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s tabard dance skirt and roughly pull it off.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] pulls your tabard dance skirt off.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your tabard dance skirt and roughly pulls it off.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s tabard dance skirt and roughly pulls it off.

replacementText.playerSelf: You pull on the tabard dance skirt.
replacementText.playerNPC: You guide [npc.name]'s [npc.lwgs] through the tabard dance skirts panties as you pull it on [npc.herHim].
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force the tabard dance skirt on [npc.her].
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] pulls on the tabard dance skirt.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] guides your [pc.legs] through the tabard dance skirts panties, before pulling it down over your torso.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly forces the tabard dance skirt on you.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] guides [npc2.name]'s [npc2.legs] through the tabard dance skirt's panties.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly forces the tabard dance skirt down on [npc2.her].
